web_snippets: This is a show where artists talk about the film scores that matter to them. ... One Hundred Years of Solitude with Andre Silva/La Tina Sonido. Andre Silva ...
Andre Silva, sound designer and cofounder of La Tina Sonido joins us to discuss the company's work on Netflix's adaptation of One Hundred Years of Solitude.
